description: Choose a skill. You are particularly adept at that skill.

sections.text: You get a +3 bonus on all checks involving the chosen skill. If you have 10 or more ranks in that skill, this bonus increases to +6.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new skill.
sections.name: Special

name: Skill Focus
